segments.content: **Records & Tuples**, a very interesting **[proposal](https://github.com/tc39/proposal-record-tuple)**, has just reached **[stage 2](https://twitter.com/robpalmer2/status/1286040041089904640)** at **TC39**.
segments.sourceMdx: **Records & Tuples**, a very interesting **[proposal](https://github.com/tc39/proposal-record-tuple)**, has just reached **[stage 2](https://twitter.com/robpalmer2/status/1286040041089904640)** at **TC39**.
segments.translated_content: **Records & Tuples** 这项极具潜力的 **[提案](https://github.com/tc39/proposal-record-tuple)** 刚刚在 **TC39** 进入 **[第二阶段](https://twitter.com/robpalmer2/status/1286040041089904640)**。

segments.content: They bring **deeply immutable data structures** to JavaScript.
segments.sourceMdx: They bring **deeply immutable data structures** to JavaScript.
segments.translated_content: 它们为 JavaScript 带来了**深度不可变的数据结构**。

segments.content: But don't overlook their **equality properties**, that are <u>**VERY**</u> interesting for **React**.
segments.sourceMdx: But don't overlook their **equality properties**, that are <u>**VERY**</u> interesting for **React**.
segments.translated_content: 但千万别忽视其**相等性特性**，这对 **React** 而言<u>**极其**</u>重要。

segments.content: A whole category of **React bugs** are related to **unstable object identities**:
segments.sourceMdx: A whole category of **React bugs** are related to **unstable object identities**:
segments.translated_content: 有一整类 **React 缺陷** 都与**不稳定的对象标识**相关：

segments.content:
* **Performance**: re-renders that could be avoided
* **Behavior**: useless effect re-executions, infinite loops
* **API surface**: unability to express when a stable object identity matters
segments.sourceMdx:
- **Performance**: re-renders that could be avoided
- **Behavior**: useless effect re-executions, infinite loops
- **API surface**: unability to express when a stable object identity matters
segments.translated_content:
- **性能**：本可避免的重复渲染
- **行为**：无意义的副作用重复执行、无限循环
- **API 层面**：无法表达何时需要稳定的对象标识

segments.content: I will explain the basics of **Records & Tuples**, and how they can solve **real world React issues**.
segments.sourceMdx: I will explain the basics of **Records & Tuples**, and how they can solve **real world React issues**.
segments.translated_content: 我将解释 **Records & Tuples** 的基础概念，以及它们如何解决 **React 实际开发中的问题**。
